journal.journal_entry: Met Cy tonight. They're a lot different from what I expected. Not just because of the mechanical limbs â€” they have a way of seeing right through you.
They noticed how much I struggle with eye contact. It was embarrassing at first, but they taught me how to handle it, bit by bit.
I think I'm starting to understand that it's not about being perfect. It's about being willing to try, even when it's uncomfortable.
